ActJudges Act
SubjectRuth Gravely ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. R.T. Patrick Gravely
PrecisGranting of an annuity to RUTH GRAVELY widow of the Hon. R.T. Patrick Gravely, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, effective March 1, 2012
